response.original_title: The heiress and her possessive bodyguard
response.overview: Three years ago, Jack Hawkins saved heiress Grace Christensen from an evil stalker, but when they reunite, a misunderstanding turns them into enemies. Now, with Grace’s safety threatened again, her father hires Jack as her personal bodyguard. When they’re forced to spend every second together, will they be able to resist each other?
response.title: The heiress and her possessive bodyguard
